name: 04-dll-externals
description: DLL 和 Externals 预编译优化对比 Demo

scripts.build:normal: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --config webpack.normal.config.js
scripts.build:dll: npm run clean && npm run build:dll:vendor && npm run build:dll:app
scripts.build:externals: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --config webpack.externals.config.js
